snippet.title: Bootstrap Island - Early Access Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
#VR #virtualreality #pcvr 

Bootstrap Island is an intense VR roguelike survival game currently in development - survive being shipwrecked on a mysterious tropical island, filled with deadly threats and secrets to explore.

🏝️ Play the free demo on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1942110/Bootstrap_Island/
🌋 Coming soon to Early Access Feb 22, 2024
🥥 Wishlist Bootstrap Island now!

Join our Discord https://discord.gg/x48uSXbUyv
Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@bootstrap.island.vr
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/BootstrapIsland/
Twitter- https://twitter.com/BootstrapIsland
Twitch - https://www.twitch.tv/islandvr
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/bootstrapisland/
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/bootstrapisland
